snippet: The contract, which includes raises averaging 43 percent and bigger retirement contributions, covers United pilots as well as those from Continental.
abstract: United Airlines pilots agree to new joint union contract, bringing airline closer to completing its merger with Continental; four-year contract includes raises averaging 43 percent and larger retirement contributions.
lead_paragraph: The contract, which includes raises averaging 43 percent and bigger retirement contributions, covers United pilots as well as those from Continental.

headline.seo: Pilots at United Agree on a Contract
headline.main: Pilots at United Agree on Contract
headline.print_headline: Pilots at United Agree on Contract
